name: sling-hockey
description: Multiplayer Sling Hockey game for LAN

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd types && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev: npm run build:types && concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client

author: JhonHurtado
